name: Soli Sorabjee
description: Some important cases fought by him include - Maneka Gandhi, Keshavananda Bharati, IR Coelho, SR Bommai, BP Singhal, etc.

name: Fali Sam Nariman
description: High-profile cases fought by him include the infamous Bhopal gas tragedy, Golak Nath, SP Gupta, TMA Pai Foundation, and the likes.

name: Ram Jethmalani
description: Famous cases - KM Nanavati vs. State of Maharashtra, Jessica Lall murder, defended Rajiv Gandhi and Indira Gandhi’s killers, underworld don Haji Mastan’s etc

name: Mukul Rohtagi
description: Famous cases fought by him include Y K Sabharwal property suit, Jharkhand Assembly floor test , 2002 Gujarat Riots, Ambani brothers’ gas supply , etc.
